_header: This wonder well under this throne
_description: Warning, ‘Ware the Wheel of Fortune’ — six lines (aabcbc)

BLHar7322.First Lines: þis wondir wel vndir þis troneit changit ofte as dot þe mone…
BLHar7322.Last Lines: …& bot þey be war to fornit ȝelt hem euele her wile
BLHar7322.Note:
Written as prose, inserted into Latin; Brown  and  Robbins (1943)
XCarleton Fairchild Brown,   and  Rossell Hope Robbins.  
             The Index of Middle English Verse.
         New York: Printed for the Index Society by Columbia University Press,
            1943 lists as entirely on f. 63.
